Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Melbourne Avenue just south of the intersection with Kafkan Way.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is the Oceancrest Mountaineer's Supply, a store specializing in climbing equipment. On the west side of the street is Lafyette's Blacksmith and Repair shop. Lafyette works mostly on weapons and armor, rather than other items, and is a congenial giant of a man.
